#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
	int t,k;
	long long int m,n;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%Ld%d%Ld",&n,&k,&m);
		if(k==1)
		{
			printf("%Ld\n",n);
			continue;
		}
		while(n%k==0&&m)
		{
			n = n/k;
			m--;
		}
		if(m%2)
			printf("%Ld\n",n*k);
		else
			printf("%Ld\n",n);
	}
	return 0;
}
